body:
With Avicore out, and new features being implemented, I decided to start fresh! Whether that is my attitude towards others, or how I Moderate in general :)
So, ask me anything! I'll be more than happy to answer them :D
body_tagged:
With Avicore out, and new features being implemented, I decided to start fresh! Whether that is my attitude towards others, or how I Moderate in general :)
So, ask me anything! I'll be more than happy to answer them :D
title: Jozzy's AMA! :D

replies.body: Do you still love me?
replies.body_tagged: Do you still love me?

replies.body:
Are you batman? - Warundell_12
No, I'm spiderman :)

Do you want to build a snowman? 
Sure! I suck at building them though :(
What year are you in school?
I don't know.
How long have you been playing Minecraft?
I bought this account just after Beta was released. 
How long have you been playing on this server?
I played MCZone, but very rarely. I became active 1 week after Avicus was released.
What was your reaction to when you got Jr.Mod and full Mod?
- Tincanrobotman 
My reaction,.... Mhmm. Good question.
When I was promoted to Jr Mod, I was pretty much speechless and there was a slice of awkward silence. Even though there was a lot of users that advocated me, I was so happy to be a fully fledged Moderator :D

Do you still love me? - evilchrizillah
Of course! :D
replies.body_tagged:
Are you batman? - Warundell_12
No, I'm spiderman :)

Sure! I suck at building them though :(
What year are you in school?
I don't know.
How long have you been playing Minecraft?
I bought this account just after Beta was released. 
How long have you been playing on this server?
I played MCZone, but very rarely. I became active 1 week after Avicus was released.
What was your reaction to when you got Jr.Mod and full Mod?
- Tincanrobotman 
My reaction,.... Mhmm. Good question.
When I was promoted to Jr Mod, I was pretty much speechless and there was a slice of awkward silence. Even though there was a lot of users that advocated me, I was so happy to be a fully fledged Moderator :D

Do you still love me? - evilchrizillah
Of course! :D

replies.body:
Why do you play Avicus, my friend?/where did you find it? - awesome_apricot 
Oh, okay sorry. You didn't make sense to me when you first stated the question :P
Anyways, I play Avicus because of the community and I've never played in a community that is this friendly! 

Why didn't you build a spectator spawn in Curabitur? :33333 - Evocal 
Well, I get distracted really easily :P
